subtitle: A deliciously creamy soup that makes an interesting change to tomato soup.

method.text: Place vegetables in a saucepan with the stock, thyme, tomato puree and seasoning. Bring to the boil then simmer for 25-30 min until beans are tender.
Meanwhile, melt the butter in a saucepan. Stir in the flour. Cook for 1 min. Gradually stir in the milk, bringing to the boil, stirring constantly. Simmer for 2-3 min until thickened.
Slowly stir the vegetable mixture into the hot milk sauce. Heat through gently for 2-3 min until piping hot, taking care not to boil or it may curdle.

title: Green bean and tomato soup
